data.name: abritamr
data.description: A pipeline for running AMRfinderPlus and collating results into functional classes

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "abriTAMR comes packaged with a version of the  AMRFinder DB consistent with current NATA accreditation. If you would like to use another DB please download it using `amrfinder -U` and use the `-d` fla"
"abriTAMR is an AMR gene detection pipeline that runs AMRFinderPlus on a single (or  list ) of given isolates and collates the results into a table"

"## Install

### Conda

abritAMR is best installed with `conda` as described below (~2 minutes on laptop)

```
conda create -n abritamr -c bioconda abritamr
```
